mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CSTMR_SRVC_CNTR (CSTMR_SRVC_CNTR_ID , USR_LGN_ID , SRVC_CNTR_DTL , SRVC_CRT_DT , CSTMR_SRVC_CNTR_STTS , CSTMR_SRVC_IS_DLT , CSTMR_SRVC_CTGRY , SRVC_CNTR_TTL) VALUES ('CC-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_CSTMR_SRVC_CNTR_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, 0) , #{usrLgnId} , #{srvcCntrDtl} , SYSDATE , 'N' , 'N' , #{cstmrSrvcCtgry} , #{srvcCntrTtl})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CSTMR_SRVC_CNTR CC WHERE CSTMR_SRVC_IS_DLT = 'N' AND USR_LGN_ID = #{usrLgnId}

SELECT CC.CSTMR_SRVC_CNTR_ID , CC.USR_LGN_ID , CC.SRVC_CNTR_DTL , TO_CHAR(CC.SRVC_CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') SRVC_CRT_DT , CC.MAN_ID , CC.ANSWR_DTL , TO_CHAR(CC.ANSWR_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ANSWR_DT , CC.CSTMR_SRVC_CNTR_STTS , CC.CSTMR_SRVC_CTGRY , CC.SRVC_CNTR_TTL , UI.USR_LNM , UI.USR_FNM FROM CSTMR_SRVC_CNTR CC LEFT JOIN USR_INF UI ON UI.USR_LGN_ID = CC.MAN_ID WHERE CC.CSTMR_SRVC_IS_DLT = 'N' AND CC.USR_LGN_ID = #{usrLgnId}
